actions.text: On agreeing to the Young (FL) amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 248 (Roll no. 207).

description: Amendment sought to delete language that provides for the expenditure of funds from the general fund for aviation programs, and moves the Aviation Trust Fund off budget.
purpose: An amendment no. 2 and printed in H.Rept. 106-185 to strike subsection (b) of section 103 and Titles IX and X that authorizes appropriations from the aviation trust fund and moves the Airport and Airway Trust Fund off budget.
